thread.title: Hear Fiona Apple’s Anti-Trump Chant “Tiny Hands”
thread.title_full: Hear Fiona Apple’s Anti-Trump Chant “Tiny Hands”

author: James Rettig
title: Hear Fiona Apple’s Anti-Trump Chant “Tiny Hands”
text:
CREDIT: Scott Dudelson/Getty Images 
Fiona Apple has shared a chant for the Women’s March , which takes place in D.C. (and at sister cities around the country) on 1/21, the day after the inauguration. Apple collaborated with composer Michael Whalen, and recorded the chant —“We don’t want your tiny hands/ Anywhere near our underpants”— directly to her phone. Last year, Apple shared an anti-Trump Christmas song and performed at a Standing Rock benefit show . Listen below. Tags: Fiona Apple , Michael Whalen Recommended for you
